title: Jhowie69
author: Jhowie69
content: Hey I know escrow escrow escrow, however I’m looking for someone who can help close out a bigger order so I can have my miners released.. I’m willing to full kyc, video chat, share id, mail, whatever it takes, sign purchase agreement you name it. Anything to be forthcoming and show my intent and transparency.. price is negotiable looking around 10k each

comments.author: ncsupanda
comments.body: Quote from: Jhowie69 on August 11, 2022, 05:56:39 AMHey I know escrow escrow escrow, howeverDoes this "however" mean you're not going to use escrow?

comments.author: Jhowie69
comments.body: If I could I would absolutely do so but a portion of the sale unfortunately is necessary towards finishing out a much larger overall balanceHence why I happily am willing to sign a purchase agreement and exchange all verifiable info via video call etc

comments.author: buckrogers
comments.created_time: August 11, 2022, 09:53:24 PMLast edit: August 11, 2022, 10:14:25 PM by buckrogers
comments.body: Quote from: Jhowie69 on August 11, 2022, 05:56:39 AMHey I know escrow escrow escrow, however I’m looking for someone who can help close out a bigger order so I can have my miners released.. I’m willing to full kyc, video chat, share id, mail, whatever it takes, sign purchase agreement you name it. Anything to be forthcoming and show my intent and transparency.. price is negotiable looking around 10k each A similar scam was on the VoskCoin Discord not too long ago with a "seller" needing funds in order to finish a bigger deal that he was into with some other "friends” they owed money to which would then release these ones to be sold, lolOnly then to be able to sell "x" miners, all vaporware etc. Not a good look OP, do you have any of these miners in hand ready to sell, and if so, please take a pic of the miners with your username and todays date, and your asking price, otherwise you can take this scam to the next forum.I’ll see if I can find some screens and info from that discord, as this sounds way too familiar. (needs money to finish large order, to then sell miners to you at huge discount) , uh huh Thanks!***edit*** Confirmed by members of the Voscoin Discord that this is in fact the same scammer.Buyer/Seller beware!Found a screen from July when they were in that discord (since banned) attempting this exact same scam, at least they should have tried to make an effort and change their name

comments.author: Jhowie69
comments.body: Hahaha beware of what buddy? A bunch of ignorant people shilled by 1 member and his fake accounts??? The member who caused the gap in the funding to pay the balance aka big lie ASICS aka $43,000 unpaid invoice which also is easily proven. That same situation that I’ve had to die and die to dig Out of ? Yes you would be correct your ignorance is again astounding. Once more cc payment accepted, full kyc, exchange of all info asked, feel free to contact me personally via video call and be proven horribly wrong once more. I will not sit back and continue to tolerate the ignorance and defamation by individuals who either have no first hand knowledge or experience, or understanding of who caused this. Ignorant. Oh wow look at that just as you couldn’t follow along the last time as you rushed To defam me here you are once more. Get a life , I suspect this is Aaron Raycove ofBig lie ASICS or his accomplice that was fired for stealing from him, weird. Displace ur own miserable pathetic life on someone else, take a look in the mirror sometime coward.

comments.author: Jhowie69
comments.body: Ur point which proves exactly what I’ve claimed. Orrrr you think I’ve maintained the same narrative for half a year while dealing with ignorance from strangers like you? I think not. That’s delusional and crazy my guy.

comments.author: buckrogers
comments.body: Quote from: Jhowie69 on August 12, 2022, 08:35:50 PMUr point which proves exactly what I’ve claimed. Orrrr you think I’ve maintained the same narrative for half a year while dealing with ignorance from strangers like you? I think not. That’s delusional and crazy my guy. Hey, "my guy", (jeez) You couldn’t have said it better yourself (well, you did), you have a “sob story narrative" asking people for money so you can pay back some “partners” who will in turn release some miners to you, so you can then flip them to people here and other places you’ve tried to before (and was called out for), for half  a year now you say? What is the hard part to understand here? No one in their right mind is going to get involved and pay off your sticky debt (if it’s even real) to then hope they can buy something from you after.There are plenty of trusted and well-known sellers here that have products in hand or have proven themselves to be reliable trusted sources, without any of your forementioned drama.You are delusional if you think otherwise.I’m sorry to be the one to inform you (although I doubt I’m the first) If someone wants to buy a miner, then a seller will list it for sale, using the standard format here on bitcointalk, and if all goes well, they will strike a deal. What do YOU not understand?No one wants any part of your MESS; made up or otherwise, do you understand that now?have a good one, NEXT!

comments.author: ncsupanda
comments.body: We can change the tune of this thread.I'll take an L7 at your 10k price - you can either:1. Send it to me directly, and I'll pay after its received/set up.2. We can use (assuming availability) philipma1957 for escrow.Thanks!

comments.author: Jhowie69
comments.body: Or you can pay via cc so that I can satisfy things on all sides. 1. You being safe 2. The source who needs to be paid can well be paid lol. I’m happy to again kyc, hop on video,Etc etc

comments.author: ncsupanda
comments.body: Quote from: Jhowie69 on August 29, 2022, 03:13:36 PM-snip-The source who needs to be paid can well be paid lol-snip-Pretty clear at this point the thread can be locked so you can stop trying to scam in Private Messages. You'll never work out a deal using escrow, since you dont own the machines.
